photo.caption: Looking for an incredible view? The view of Nagasaki at night from Mount Inasa is considered one of the most beautiful in all of Japan, and has to be seen to be believed! A short ride on a cable car is all it takes to see this romantic, stunning scenery, so what are you waiting for?

result_object.geo_description: History may overshadow Nagasaki in foreigners' minds, but pay a visit, and you'll find a thriving, easy-going, and welcoming city. Set around a picturesque harbor, Nagasaki also has a surprisingly cosmopolitan flavor, a legacy of the Dutch, Chinese, and British communities that have left their mark.
